Issue.description: A follow-on activity to FAB-7661 is to update methods that have a WithOpt to allow functional parameters in their basic func (i.e., the func not labelled WithOpt), where appropriate (particularly where non-primitives are being passed). In other cases, to investigate whether to use variadic options style ( https://dave.cheney.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/Screenshot-from-2014-10-15-033605.png ).
